text:
I wish there was an extension for :chrome: *chrome* that would, after closing the current tab, go to the immediate LEFT tab (not right)
Since I often clean up my tabs by closing them right-to-left, and leaving the ones I need on the right.

elements.text: I wish there was an extension for

that would, after closing the current tab, go to the immediate LEFT tab (not right)
Since I often clean up my tabs by closing them right-to-left, and leaving the ones I need on the right.

text: Ah, but that requires two presses: Ctrl + W, Ctrl +Shift + Tab. It would be nice if there was a way to achieve this with one shortcut.

elements.text: Ah, but that requires two presses: Ctrl + W, Ctrl +Shift + Tab. It would be nice if there was a way to achieve this with one shortcut.
